channel.title: How do I make my character float?
channel.description: I know the command: ::emote 1501 that makes them float, but when you click, they stop... how do I make him float continuously???

item.title: How do I make my character float?
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Escape, Its In Server Files, Open Up Your Server Files, go into Bulby/Io/Packets, and you will see “Commands” Or “Commands.java”

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make my character float?
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

Try This,

[code]} else if(cmd[0].equals(“god”) && p.rights > 1) {
p.requestAnim(1500, 0);
p.runEmote = 1851;
p.walkEmote = 1851;
p.standEmote = 1501;
p.runEnergy = 99999999;

p.frames.sendMessage(p,“God mode on”);
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;[/code]

Put it in Commands.java

Read full topic
